review.title: “Fantastic employer”
review.pros: Pros – Experience in the mental health field, off on Fridays, raises based on performance and amount of work, fantastic health insurance
review.cons: Cons – Occasionally there were difficult patients, rarely late evenings and rarely work through lunch, usually busy all day (though I considered this a pro - it made the day go by faster)
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Thank you for always being understanding and fair.
